label: Our Technology
heading: Advanced Care, Modern Comfort
description: We invest in the latest dental technology so you can enjoy faster, more comfortable, and more precise treatments every visit.

technologies.title: CEREC Same-Day Crowns
technologies.description: Using Sirona CEREC technology, we design and mill custom ceramic crowns right in our office — no temporary crowns or second visits needed.

technologies.title: Digital X-Rays & Imaging
technologies.description: Our digital radiography system delivers instant, high-resolution images with up to 80% less radiation than traditional film x-rays.

technologies.title: Intraoral Cameras
technologies.description: See what we see. Our high-definition intraoral cameras let you view real-time images of your teeth to better understand your treatment.

technologies.title: SureSmile Clear Aligners
technologies.description: Computer-designed clear aligners for precise, comfortable teeth straightening — custom-fabricated for your unique smile.

technologies.title: Laser Dentistry
technologies.description: Minimally invasive laser treatments for gum therapy, cavity detection, and soft tissue procedures — often with no anesthetic needed.

technologies.title: Nitrous Oxide Sedation
technologies.description: Comfortable, anxiety-free visits with safe nitrous oxide sedation — perfect for patients who feel nervous about dental procedures.
